analysis: The project is a web application with a focus on black holes, featuring a dark, cosmic theme. The existing files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript components for a test website, along with documentation and GitHub page files. The theme should emphasize black holes, with animations, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The UI should be mobile-friendly, with a navigation menu and interactive elements.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.
Complete the JavaScript content to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality, including the mobile menu toggle and interactive elements.
Fix the SVG data URL in --black-hole-pattern-5 to include proper SVG content and ensure it is correctly formatted.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
